item.title: Palestinians flee IDF attacks on Gaza City as Israelis protest occupation plan
item.description: Israeli bombardment has created a "catastrophic" situation in the city's Zeitoun neighbourhood, the city's Hamas-run authority says.

item.title: Russia complicating end to war, says Zelensky ahead of Trump meeting
item.description: The US president will meet his Ukrainian counterpart in Washington on Monday in the wake of his Alaska summit with Vladimir Putin on Friday.

item.title: Serbia ruling party offices set on fire in protests
item.description: Russia throws support behind the beleaguered president, saying it won't "remain unresponsive" to unrest.

item.title: Protesters target Serbian ruling party offices in fifth night of demonstrations
item.description: Offices belonging to President Aleksander Vučić's political party were vandalised during the fifth consecutive night of unrest.

item.title: Trump posted a photo of me sitting by my tent - then a bulldozer arrived
item.description: DC's largest homeless encampment was destroyed after the president called for a crackdown. What happened to its residents?
